name: Harinath Sangyam
company_address: 18-6-243, Outside Gowlipura, Near Gandhi Statue, Hyderabad, India, 500053
my_business: Harinath AssureNest is a trusted name in life insurance solutions, dedicated to helping individuals and businesses protect what matters most. Founded by Harinath Sangyam, the company focuses on creating personalized insurance plans that support family savings, secure futures, and long-term financial stability.
top_product: Our top product is the Family Future Savings Plan — a comprehensive life insurance solution designed to help individuals and families save systematically while building a secure financial foundation. This plan not only ensures life coverage, but also supports goal-based savings like children’s education, marriage, retirement, or emergency funds. It’s ideal for those who want to protect their loved ones while preparing for life’s key milestones — all in one smart, tax-saving product. Whether you're planning for personal peace of mind or looking to create long-term stability for your family, this plan offers a perfect blend of protection, discipline, and growth.
ideal_referral: An ideal referral for me is: a. Individuals or families who are looking to secure their future through smart savings plans, life insurance, and goal-based financial planning. Whether it's education, retirement, or long-term security — I help them make informed decisions that bring peace of mind. b. Businesses or organizations that care about their employees’ well-being and are interested in providing comprehensive insurance solutions — covering not just employees, but also their families. I specialize in helping companies build financial security into their workforce benefits.
top_problem_solved: One of the most common and critical problems I solve is helping families and individuals who lack a structured financial plan for their future. Many people delay life insurance or savings planning, not realizing the risks they’re exposing their loved ones to. I step in to simplify the process, understand their life goals, and provide customized insurance solutions that ensure both protection and future savings. From a parent worried about children’s education, to a business owner unsure how to secure their team — I bring clarity, confidence, and a sense of security to their financial planning. It’s not just about a policy — it’s about helping them sleep better at night knowing their future is in safe hands.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI moments was when a simple introduction turned into a life-changing opportunity — not just for me, but for the client I was referred to. A fellow member connected me with a family that had never explored life insurance before. After understanding their goals, I created a customized plan that secured their children’s education and future savings. What touched me the most wasn’t just closing the deal — it was when the client said, “You didn’t just sell a policy, you gave us peace of mind.” That’s when I truly understood the power of BNI — not just as a business network, but as a platform where trust transforms into impact.

company_address: Environ Design Studio, E1 plot no 19, Ground Floor, Happy valley,, rd no 10 Banjara hills, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500034
my_business:
At Environ Design Studio, we design sustainable, functional, and inspiring spaces that enhance everyday living.
Our Services:
- Interior & Architecture – Timeless, purpose-driven designs.
- Sustainable Interiors – Eco-conscious and wellness-focused spaces.
- 3D Visualization – Realistic previews for better design decisions.
- Turnkey Solutions – End-to-end execution from concept to completion.
- Green Consultation – Expert advice on sustainable design strategies.
- Green Rating Consultation – Support for IGBC and other certifications.
top_product: Model Villas & Sample Flats Design Helping builders boost sales with well-designed, aspirational spaces that showcase the best of their properties. Supporting Products: Residential Interior Design Turnkey Design & Build Services Green Rating Consultation
ideal_referral: A homeowner, builder, or business owner who is planning to design, renovate, or build an interior space—and is looking for creative, functional, and well-executed design solutions. Whether it’s a new home, model flat, duplex villa, or a interior space, I help turn their vision into reality with a thoughtful, end-to-end interior design approach.
top_problem_solved: We were entrusted with the transformation of a single-storey independent residence into a G+3 duplex villa. The design scope involved strategic structural interventions, including cutting through the existing slab to create a dramatic double-height space. Our integrated design-and-build approach enabled the seamless addition of premium functional spaces such as a home theatre, gym, and an outdoor deck area designed for social gatherings. The project was successfully delivered, aligning with the client’s vision of elevated, experiential living.
my_favourite_bni_story: "One of my favorite BNI memories is from the day I got inducted. It happened in the morning, and later that evening, we had the Ugadhi Banthi Bhojanam as part of our BNI Social. It felt so special—starting the day as a new member and ending it by celebrating tradition, amazing food, and meaningful connections. That day made me feel instantly included, and it truly marked the beginning of something exciting in both business and community."
